articles.description: Follow live score updates as Man City face Fulham as they push on in the title race, Tottenham play Burnley as they look for a a Champions League spot, plus action from six more games.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Fulham vs Man City, Tottenham vs Burnley & Nottingham Forest vs Chelsea - score, text updates & commentary

articles.description: Burnley are relegated from the Premier League after they cannot secure a win at Tottenham which would keep their hopes alive.
articles.title: Tottenham 2-1 Burnley: Clarets relegated from Premier League after Spurs loss

articles.description: England overcome an early batting collapse to complete a comfortable 53-run win over Pakistan in the first T20 at Edgbaston.
articles.title: England v Pakistan: Hosts overcome early collapse to win by 53 runs

articles.description: Manchester City put the pressure on Arsenal in the title race by beating Fulham to move two points clear at the top of the Premier League.
articles.title: Fulham 0-4 Manchester City: Josko Gvardiol scores twice to edge Blues closer to title

articles.description: England bowler James Anderson, one of the greatest bowlers of all time, confirms he will retire this summer.
articles.title: James Anderson: England bowler to retire this summer

articles.description: Newcastle drop points in their pursuit of European football as Brighton spoil their final home match of the Premier League season by earning a draw at St James’ Park.
articles.title: Newcastle United 1-1 Brighton & Hove Albion: European hopefuls held at St James' Park

articles.description: Rafael Nadal is knocked out of the Italian Open by Hubert Hurkacz in what could be the Spaniard's final appearance in Rome.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal out of Italian Open with defeat by Hubert Hurkacz

articles.description: Celtic are on the brink of another Scottish Premiership title after emerging from a stormy derby against 10-man Rangers with a vital victory.
articles.title: Celtic 2-1 Rangers: Brendan Rodgers' side on brink of title

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar stretches his lead with victory on stage eight of the Giro d'Italia.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia: Tadej Pogacar extends lead with stage eight victory

articles.description: Nikola Jokic stars as the Denver Nuggets, defending NBA champions, beat the Minnesota Timberwolves 117-90 to reduce the deficit to 2-1 in the Western Conference semi-finals of the play-offs.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Nikola Jokic helps Denver Nuggets peg back Minnesota Timberwolves in semi-final series
